note.p: Career: Demonstrator of Anatomy, Royal College of Surgeons, Dublin; Professor of Anatomy and Surgery, University of Dublin; Professor of Anatomy, University of Cambridge (1883, for 36 years); also studied Egyptology and Church history; was a Presbyterian; died after a long illness
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1922-1923 vol 94 pp xxxii-xxxix signed by G E S
Notes: Geo Busk crossed out, with note "(on the Council)"
